item.title: BM or HL2?
item.dc:creator: JohnWorfin
item.description:
Shortstuff910mc:

Which do you prefer Black Mesa or Half life 2 story line?

Well, the first time I played Black mesa I was just looking for the regular stuff in the HL1 story but by the third time I played it I could see all the little details the devs put in, like the revamped on a rail or the hints of the combine on xen. That really fleshed out the story for me, not to mention all the easter eggs i found. But as good as it was, I still liked the HL2 story more. I mean c’mon, alyx’s ass in those HE11A tight jeans!!!111111!one!!!1!! You gotta love that
